title: The Adventures of Judy Turner: Consulting Hero

story.text: Judy Turner, a 21-year-old management consultant, discovers she can see the future outcomes of her advice, allowing her to provide perfect strategies to her clients.
Using her newfound abilities, Judy saves a struggling local business from bankruptcy, predicting market trends that lead to a successful turnaround.
Judy is approached by a mysterious figure who warns her about the dangers of her power and its potential to disrupt natural order.
Tensions rise as Judy helps a non-profit avoid a fraudulent scheme, using her powers she had seen the unfortunate outcome if she hadn't intervened.
Local media start to notice the sudden successes of companies and causes Judy is associated with, and rumors about her extraordinary ability begin to spread.
Judy decides to openly embrace her powers, giving a public consultation to a failing school system and turning it into a model of efficiency and educational success.
Reflecting on her week, Judy realizes the responsibility her powers carry and decides to establish an ethical code for herself, aiming to use her skills solely for the common good.

ending: Thus, Judy Turner, the Consulting Hero, embraced her unique gifts, vowing to use them to better the world around her.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
